Elected Officials
=================

**Mayor**  
Rue Rogers (Term Expires May 2026)

**Mayor Pro-Tem**  
Chuck Stennett (Term Expires May 2027)

**Council Members**

Ronnie Cowart (Term Expires May 2026)  
Steven Nurre (Term Expires May 2027)  
Thea Sullivan (Term Expires May 2027)  
Terri Wipperman (Term Expires May 2026)
